Boost Your jobsDB Experience with Better JobsDB!

Tired of navigating through endless filters on jobsDB? Introducing Better JobsDB, your new best friend for streamlined job hunting! This extension empowers you to instantly jump to any page within your current filter, saving you precious time and clicks.

Here's what you get:

Effortless navigation: With a single click, reach any page under your chosen filter criteria. No more back-and-forth through endless pages!
Time-saving efficiency: Focus on what matters – finding the perfect job – rather than spending time on repetitive clicking.
Simple and intuitive: Get started instantly with our user-friendly interface. No technical expertise required!

Please note: As a first-time project, this extension might still need some polishing. We're constantly working on improvements, and your feedback is invaluable!

Download Better JobsDB today and unlock a smoother, faster jobsDB experience!
